author: Kathmandu Post
title: Government Cuts Non-Communicable Disease Funding from Rs47 Million to Rs21 Million
description: Nepal Government Slashes Funding for Non-Communicable Diseases from Rs47 Million to Rs21 Million Despite Causing 73% of Nepal’s Deaths

author: WHO
title: Nepal vaccinates over 1.46 million girls with the HPV vaccine
description: Nepal has vaccinated over 1.46 million girls, through a nationwide HPV campaign, supported by Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, WHO and UNICEF, achieving 94% administrative coverage.

author: बागमती प्रदेश सरकार
title: स्वास्थ्य मन्त्री किरण थापा मगरबाट बागमती प्रदेशमा स्वास्थ्य संस्था दर्ता तथा नवीकरण प्रणाली(HRRS) को डिजिटल शुभारम्भ।
description: स्वास्थ्य निर्देशनालय, हेटौंडाद्वारा आयोजित आ.व.८१/८२ को अर्धवार्षिक समीक्षा तथा आगामी आ.व.८२/८३ को योजना तर्जुमा गोष्ठीको अवसरमा स्वास्थ्य मन्त्री मा. किरण थापा मगरबाट बागमती प्रदेशमा स्वास्थ्य संस्था दर्ता तथा नवीकरण प्रणाली(HRRS) को डिजिटल शुभारम्भ।

author: Kathmandu University
title: Kathmandu University Opens Health Informatics Affiliation
description: KU invites private colleges across Nepal to apply for affiliation in Bachelor in Health Informatics and other programs by June 24, 2025.
